ing: 2 pounds kielbasa (Polish) sausage, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
des: "Enjoy these addicting appetizers. There will be no leftovers."
ins: Combine the beer, barbecue sauce, brown sugar, and Dijon mustard in a large skillet over medium heat. Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally; reduce heat to low and add the kielbasa. Simmer until kielbasa is browned and glazed, about 1 hour.
